about_the_game:
In Outlaw Driver Simulator you will take part in dangerous, underground illegal street races with high-performance and upgraded cars. Feel the thrill of the chase and maximum acceleration! Earn respect from powerful city gangs.



Get your first car, pimp it, and get into the circle of suspicious types. Thanks to the personalization of car parameters settings and detailing, you will be able to give your machine not only character but also personality. Let everyone in the brave feel respect for you and want to compete with you. Collect more cars, let the crowd praise you and rivals envy you!


The open-world allows you to explore unique places, adapted to driving. Find your starting point, sign up for a race, and start framed with the best drivers around. Remember that the city is under the strict control of the police. But the darkest place is under the candlestick. Don't get caught by cops, don't let the hand of justice reach you. Forget morality - You are Outlaw!



Features:
  • A variety of urban Open-World locations.
  • Realistic car customization system.
  • Extensive editing of car settings.
  • Highly developed car tuning mechanics.
  • The underground atmosphere.
  • An extensive physics system realistically recreates a car ride.
  • Support for standard steering wheels and controllers.

Have fun and earn money. Each race is a risk of being caught or crashed, but it is also full of excitement and adrenaline.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64bit OS
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 / AMD Radeon RX 460
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Drive super-tuned cars into the Open World of underground and illegal racing through city streets. Simulate repairing and upgrading the performance or appearance of unique high-performance cars. Outsmart the police pursuits and earn a fortune in the rivalry as an Absolute Outlaw Driver!
supported_languages: English, Polish, French, German, Russian, Italian, Spanish - Spain
